directions: In a bowl stir together the olives, the herbs, the lemon juice, the zest, and the oil and let the olives marinate, covered and chilled, for 3 days. The marinated olives may be made 2 weeks in advance and kept covered and chilled. Serve the olives at room temperature.
ingredients: 1 pound Kalamata or other brine-cured black olives, drained and  patted dry
five 2-inch strips of lemon zest, removed with a vegetable peeler
title: Herbed Olives
